title: Real-Time Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to receive real-time health updates and alerts for my clients so that I can monitor their well-being effectively and intervene when necessary.

title: Real-Time Alerts for Client Health Anomalies
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive real-time alerts for any health anomalies so that I can take timely action to ensure their safety and well-being.

title: Secure Access to Client Health Data
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want secure access to my clients' health data so that I can monitor their health metrics and respond promptly to any changes while respecting their privacy.

title: Simplified Client Health Management Dashboard
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a simplified client health management dashboard so that I can efficiently monitor multiple clients' health statuses in real-time without complicated navigation.

title: Streamlined Communication Features for Caregiver Coordination
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to have streamlined communication features within ALFRED so that I can easily coordinate care and maintain clear communication with my clients' family members and healthcare professionals.

title: Training and Support Resources for Professional Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want access to training and support resources for using ALFRED so that I can efficiently monitor my clients and coordinate their care without confusion or delays.

title: Integration with Emergency Services for Client Safety
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to integrate with emergency services so that I can ensure my clients receive immediate assistance in case of a health crisis.

title: Customizable Alerts for Real-Time Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive customizable alerts for significant changes in my clients' health metrics so that I can intervene promptly and ensure their well-being.

title: Logging of Caregiving Activities and Client Health Metrics
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to log caregiving activities and track client health metrics in real-time so that I can efficiently manage multiple clients' health and ensure timely interventions.

title: Feedback System for Caregiver Usability and Experience
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a feedback system that allows me to report usability issues and suggest improvements so that I can better manage my clients' care and enhance my experience with the ALFRED system.
